mapper.select: SELECT IF(fol.MBER_IDX IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS FOLLOWING ,ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, ent.ENT_INDUTY_NM,up.EVALUATION_AVG,up.PAY_AMT_AVG, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT, ld.ADDR_BCITY_NM, ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_NM,revw.REVW_CNT,intrvw.INTRVW_CNT FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_IDX, COUNT(*) AS REVW_CNT FROM REVIEW_TB WHERE REVW_FL = 1 GROUP BY ENT_IDX ) revw ON ent.ENT_IDX = revw.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_IDX, COUNT(*) AS INTRVW_CNT FROM INTERVIEW_TB WHERE INTRVW_FL = 1 GROUP BY ENT_IDX ) intrvw ON ent.ENT_IDX = intrvw.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG_TB ld ON ent.ADDR_BCITY_CD = ld.ADDR_BCITY_CD AND ent.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD = ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD AND ld.ADDR_EMD_CD = IF(ent.ADDR_EMD_CD = ld.ADDR_EMD_CD,ent.ADDR_EMD_CD,0 ) LEFT JOIN FOLLOWING_TB fol ON fol.ENT_IDX=ent.ENT_IDX AND fol.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} WHERE ent.ENT_SBSCRB_ST = 1 AND ent.ENT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY ent.ENT_IDX ORDER BY LENGTH(ent.ENT_NM),ent.ENT_NM

SELECT ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX WHERE ent.ENT_SBSCRB_ST = 1 ORDER BY up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT DESC LIMIT #{RANK_VIEW_COUNT}

SELECT IF(fol.MBER_IDX is not null, 1, 0) as FOLLOWING , ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, ent.ENT_INDUTY_NM,ent.ENT_FOND_YMD,up.PAY_AMT_AVG, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT, ld.ADDR_BCITY_NM, ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_NM FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG_TB ld ON ent.ADDR_BCITY_CD = ld.ADDR_BCITY_CD AND ent.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD = ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD AND ld.ADDR_EMD_CD = IF(ent.ADDR_EMD_CD = ld.ADDR_EMD_CD,ent.ADDR_EMD_CD,0 ) LEFT JOIN FOLLOWING_TB fol ON fol.ENT_IDX=ent.ENT_IDX AND fol.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} WHERE ent.ENT_IDX = #{ENT_IDX}

SELECT a.ENT_IDX,sum(a.NPN_NW_SBSCRBER_CNT) as newPerson,sum(a.NPN_SCBT_CNT) as outPerson FROM (SELECT ENT_IDX,NPN_NW_SBSCRBER_CNT,NPN_SCBT_CNT,PAY_YM FROM NPN_DTLS_TB WHERE ENT_IDX = #{ENT_IDX} order by PAY_YM desc limit 12)a
SELECT NPN_DTLS_IDX,ENT_IDX,NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT,NPN_NW_SBSCRBER_CNT,NPN_SCBT_CNT,PAY_YM,PAY_AMT FROM NPN_DTLS_TB WHERE ENT_IDX = #{ENT_IDX} ORDER BY PAY_YM

SELECT fol.MBER_IDX ,ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, ent.ENT_INDUTY_NM,up.EVALUATION_AVG,up.PAY_AMT_AVG, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT, ld.ADDR_BCITY_NM, ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_NM,revw.REVW_CNT,intrvw.INTRVW_CNT FROM FOLLOWING_TB fol LEFT JOIN ENTERPRISE_TB ent ON fol.ENT_IDX=ent.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_IDX, COUNT(*) AS REVW_CNT FROM REVIEW_TB WHERE REVW_FL = 1 GROUP BY ENT_IDX ) revw ON ent.ENT_IDX = revw.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_IDX, COUNT(*) AS INTRVW_CNT FROM INTERVIEW_TB WHERE INTRVW_FL = 1 GROUP BY ENT_IDX ) intrvw ON ent.ENT_IDX = intrvw.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG_TB ld ON ent.ADDR_BCITY_CD = ld.ADDR_BCITY_CD AND ent.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD = ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD AND ld.ADDR_EMD_CD = IF(ent.ADDR_EMD_CD = ld.ADDR_EMD_CD,ent.ADDR_EMD_CD,0 ) WHERE fol.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} GROUP BY ent.ENT_IDX

SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS vie.VIEW_IDX,vie.VISIT_DT,fol.MBER_IDX as FOLLOWING ,ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, ent.ENT_INDUTY_NM,up.EVALUATION_AVG,up.PAY_AMT_AVG, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT, ld.ADDR_BCITY_NM, ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_NM,revw.REVW_CNT,intrvw.INTRVW_CNT FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_IDX, COUNT(*) AS REVW_CNT FROM REVIEW_TB WHERE REVW_FL = 1 GROUP BY ENT_IDX ) revw ON ent.ENT_IDX = revw.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN (SELECT ENT_IDX, COUNT(*) AS INTRVW_CNT FROM INTERVIEW_TB WHERE INTRVW_FL = 1 GROUP BY ENT_IDX ) intrvw ON ent.ENT_IDX = intrvw.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG_TB ld ON ent.ADDR_BCITY_CD = ld.ADDR_BCITY_CD AND ent.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD = ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD AND ld.ADDR_EMD_CD = IF(ent.ADDR_EMD_CD = ld.ADDR_EMD_CD,ent.ADDR_EMD_CD,0 ) LEFT JOIN VIEW_RECORD_TB vie ON vie.ENT_IDX = ent.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN FOLLOWING_TB fol ON fol.ENT_IDX=ent.ENT_IDX AND fol.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} WHERE vie.MBER_IDX=#{MBER_IDX} GROUP BY ent.ENT_IDX ORDER BY vie.VISIT_DT desc LIMIT #{NUM_OF_RECENT_PER_PAGE} OFFSET #{START_ROW}
